en-US.summary: Allows the user to obtain information on current and future limited availability product lotteries from Virginia ABC.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Liquor Lottery what are the upcoming lotteries
Alexa, ask Liquor Lottery what are the current lotteries
Alexa, ask Liquor Lottery to give me the current lottery
en-US.name: Virginia Liquor Lottery
en-US.description: Find out what products are currently in an open lottery or available for a future lottery from the Virginia Department of Alcoholic Beverage Control stores. This skill is in no way affiliated with Virginia ABC.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Ask for upcoming lotteries.  Ask for open lotteries.  To check against the actual products, take a look at https://www.abc.virginia.gov/products/limited-availability .
